name: SparseTriangle_t
desc: A structure that defines which triangle a symmetric matrix stores, or whether a triangular matrix is upper or lower.

items.name: var SparseLowerTriangle: SparseTriangle_t
items.desc: A constant that specifies the lower triangle.

items.name: var SparseUpperTriangle: SparseTriangle_t
items.desc: A constant that specifies the upper triangle.
